keys: Empresariales. Negocios en acción. Hoja de trabajo
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4616</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Marketing and Planning (HL)</string>
            <string language="es">Marketing y planificación (HL)</string>
            <string language="ga">Margaíocht agus Pleanáil (AL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Marketing und Planung (HL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vente et planification (HL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marketing e planeamento (HL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vendita e progettazione (HL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάρκετινγκ και προγραμματισμός (HL)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Marketing factsheet covering the concept of marketing, the marketing mix, marketing strategies, a detailed account of market segmentation and diagrammatic information on market planning and business planning.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa de marketing que trata el concepto de marketing, el marketing mix, las estrategias de marketing, da una explicación detallada de la segmentación del mercado e información en diagramas sobre la planificación del mercado y de los negocios.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice margaíochta a chlúdaíonn coincheap na margaíochta, an meascán margaíochta, straitéisí margaíochta, cuntas sonrach ar dheighilt margaidh agus eolas léaráideach ar phleanáil margaidh agus pleanáil gnó.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales. Negocios en acción. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business in Action</string>
            <string language="ga">Business in Action</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Marketing-Checkliste, die das Konzept des 
Marketings, der Marketing-Mischung, der Marketing-Strategien, der 
spezifizierten Rechnung der Absatzsegmentierung und der graphischen 
Informationen über Marktplanung und Unternehmensplanung umfaßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données de vente couvrant le concept du
marketing, du mélange de vente, des stratégies de vente, d'un compte
détaillé de segmentation des marchés et de l'information 
schématique sur la planification du marché et la planification des 
affaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet do marketing que cobre o conceito do 
marketing, da mistura do marketing, de estratégias do marketing, de 
um cliente detalhado da segmentação de mercado e da informação 
diagrammatic no planeamento de mercado e no planeamento de negócio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda di vendita che riguarda il concetto 
dell'introduzione sul mercato, della miscela di vendita, delle 
strategie di vendita, di un cliente dettagliato di segmentazione del 
mercato e delle informazioni diagrammatiche sulla pianificazione del 
mercato e sulla pianificazione di affari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμπορικός το ενημερωτικό δελτίο που καλύπτει την 
έννοια του μάρκετινγκ, το μίγμα μάρκετινγκ, τις εμπορικές 
στρατηγικές, ένας λεπτομερής απολογισμός της κατάτμησης αγοράς 
και των διαγραμματικών πληροφοριών για τον προγραμματισμό αγοράς 
και τον επιχειρησιακό προγραμματισμό.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft in der Tätigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires dans l'action</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio na ação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio nell'azione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση στην ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
